list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a container or covering) accidentally lose or admit contents, especially liquid or gas, through a hole or crack.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: who had a motive to leak the story?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ai đã có một động cơ để rò rỉ câu chuyện?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hole in a container or covering through which contents, especially liquid or gas, may accidentally pass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I checked all of the pipes for leaks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã kiểm tra tất cả các đường ống cho rò rỉ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an intentional disclosure of something secret or private.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: one of the employees was responsible for the leak
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một trong những nhân viên chịu trách nhiệm về rò rỉ
